021import me.clip.placeholderapi.expansion.PlaceholderExpansion;
022import net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.legacy.LegacyComponentSerializer;
023import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
024import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.CurrencyFormatter;
029import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
032import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
034
035import java.math.BigDecimal;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Optional;
038import java.util.UUID;
039
040/**
041 * PAPIHook
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046public class PAPIHook extends PlaceholderExpansion {
047
048  @Override
049  public String getAuthor() {
050
051    return "creatorfromhell";
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public String getIdentifier() {
056
057    return "TNE";
058  }
059
060  @Override
061  public String getVersion() {
062
063    return "0.1.2.8";
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public boolean persist() {
068
069    return true;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public String onPlaceholderRequest(final Player player, @NotNull final String identifier) {
074
075    if(player == null) {
076      return null;
077    }
078
079    final String[] args = identifier.split("_");
080
081    Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(player.getUniqueId());
082    if(identifier.contains("player:")) {
083
084      final String[] playerTest = identifier.split("player:");
085      if(playerTest.length >= 2) {
086        account = TNECore.api().getAccount(playerTest[1]);
087      }
088    }
089
090    if(account.isEmpty()) {
091      return null;
092    }
093
094    //%tne_balance:inventory/balance:e_chest/balance:experience/balance:virtualargs[1]%
095    if(identifier.contains("balance:")) {
096
097      PluginCore.log().debug("Balance ID: " + args[0].split(":")[1]);
098
099      final Identifier id = switch(args[0].split(":")[1]) {
100        case "inventory" -> EconomyManager.INVENTORY_ONLY;
101        case "virtual" -> EconomyManager.VIRTUAL;
102        case "ender" -> EconomyManager.E_CHEST;
103        default -> EconomyManager.NORMAL;
104      };
105
106      final UUID curID = TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getUid();
107      final List<HoldingsEntry> entries = account.get().getHoldings(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(), curID, id);
108      final BigDecimal amount = (!entries.isEmpty())? entries.get(0).getAmount() : BigDecimal.ZERO;
109
110      if(args.length >= 2 && args[1].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted")) {
111        if(!entries.isEmpty()) {
112          return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entries.get(0));
113        }
114
115        final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(),
116                                                      curID,
117                                                      amount,
118                                                      EconomyManager.NORMAL);
119        return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entry);
120      } else {
121        return amount.toPlainString();
122      }
123    }
124
125    //%tne_balance%
126    if(identifier.contains("balance")) {
127
128      final UUID curID = TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getUid();
129      final BigDecimal amount = account.get().getHoldingsTotal(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(),
130                                                               curID);
131
132      if(args.length >= 2 && args[1].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted")) {
133        final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(),
134                                                      curID,
135                                                      amount,
136                                                      EconomyManager.NORMAL);
137        return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entry);
138      } else {
139        return amount.toPlainString();
140      }
141    }
142
143    //%tne_wcurarg[0]_<world name>arg[1]_<currency name>arg[2]
144    if(identifier.toLowerCase().contains("wcur_")) {
145      if(args.length >= 3) {
146
147        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(args[1]);
148        final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(args[2]);
149
150        final UUID curID = (currency.isPresent())? currency.get().getUid() : TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getUid();
151
152
153        final BigDecimal amount = account.get().getHoldingsTotal(region, curID);
154
155        if(args.length >= 4 && args[3].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted")) {
156          final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region,
157                                                        curID,
158                                                        amount,
159                                                        EconomyManager.NORMAL);
160          return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entry);
161        } else {
162          return amount.toPlainString();
163        }
164      }
165    }
166
167    //%tne_world_<world name>args[1]%
168    if(identifier.toLowerCase().contains("world_")) {
169      if(args.length >= 2) {
170
171        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(args[1]);
172        final UUID curID = TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(region).getUid();
173        final BigDecimal amount = account.get().getHoldingsTotal(region, curID);
174
175        if(args.length >= 3 && args[2].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted")) {
176
177          final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region,
178                                                        curID,
179                                                        amount,
180                                                        EconomyManager.NORMAL);
181          return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entry);
182        } else {
183          return amount.toPlainString();
184        }
185      }
186    }
187
188    //%tne_currency_<currency name>args[1]%
189    if(identifier.toLowerCase().contains("currency_")) {
190      if(args.length >= 2) {
191
192        final String region = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
193        final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(args[1]);
194
195        final UUID curID = (currency.isPresent())? currency.get().getUid() : TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getUid();
196
197
198        final BigDecimal amount = account.get().getHoldingsTotal(region, curID);
199        if(args.length >= 3 && args[2].equalsIgnoreCase("formatted")) {
200
201          final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region,
202                                                        curID,
203                                                        amount,
204                                                        EconomyManager.NORMAL);
205          return CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), entry);
206        } else {
207          return amount.toPlainString();
208        }
209      }
210    }
211
212    //%tne_toppos[0]_<currency name>[1]_position[2]_<pos>[3]%
213    //%tne_toppos[0]_<currency name>[1]%
214    if(identifier.toLowerCase().contains("toppos")) {
215      int pos = 0;
216
217      if(args.length >= 2) {
218
219        final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(args[1]);
220        final UUID curID = (currency.isPresent())? currency.get().getUid() : TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getUid();
221
222        if(args.length >= 4 && args[2].equalsIgnoreCase("position")) {
223
224          //%tne_toppos[0]_<currency name>[1]_position[2]_<pos>[3]%
225          pos = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
226          return LegacyComponentSerializer.legacySection().serialize(MessageHandler.grab(TNECore.eco().getTopManager().getFor(pos, curID), player.getUniqueId()));
227
228        } else {
229
230          //%tne_toppos[0]_<currency name>[1]%
231          pos = TNECore.eco().getTopManager().position(curID, account.get().getName());
232        }
233      }
234      return String.valueOf(pos);
235    }
236    return null;
237  }
238
239  public boolean formatted(final String parameter) {
240
241    return parameter.contains("formatted");
242  }
243
244  public Optional<Account> findFromArgs(final String parameter) {
245
246    return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(parameter);
247  }
248}
